titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Bosnia Herzegovina
Bosnia Herzegovina

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina has a Freedom of Access to Information Act that went into effect in 2002. Researchers must apply in writing to the creating agency and there is a right of appeal if the request is rejected.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Musala St. 2, 71000 Sarajevo.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about access to diplomatic records.
